title: Add sweet romantic animations to Valentine page

requirements.text: Enhance the Valentine page with additional sweet, romantic animations beyond the current pulse/bounce effects, including a subtle ambient background animation (e.g., floating hearts/particles) that runs on both the question screen and the success screen.

quotes: Yes add some animation in it to make it look more sweeter

acceptanceCriteria: On both screens (pre-accept and accepted), an ambient background animation is visible and feels romantic (e.g., slowly floating hearts).
The animation does not block clicking/tapping the Yes button or interacting with the page (background elements must not capture pointer events).
The animation performs smoothly on typical mobile/tablet browsers (no obvious stutter during normal interaction).

requirements.text: Add smooth UI transitions to make state changes feel sweeter, including a more polished transition when switching from the question screen to the success screen after clicking the Yes button (e.g., fade/scale transition for the main card/content).

quotes: Yes add some animation in it to make it look more sweeter

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Yes button triggers a noticeable but subtle transition (fade and/or scale) into the success UI.
No layout jumps or overlapping elements occur during the transition.

requirements.text: Add small micro-interactions that reinforce the romantic tone: improve hover/tap feedback on the Yes button (e.g., gentle shimmer/glow or soft bounce) and add a playful motion cue for the evasive No button (e.g., a short wiggle before/while it moves) without changing its evasive behavior.

quotes: Yes add some animation in it to make it look more sweeter

acceptanceCriteria: The Yes button has an additional sweet micro-interaction on hover/tap in addition to the existing scale effect.
The No button still moves away on hover/touch/focus as it currently does, and also includes a short playful motion effect that does not prevent it from moving.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (these are read-only/immutable paths).
Keep all changes within the existing single-page Valentine flow (no new pages or routing).
nonGoals: Adding new backend canister features or storing Valentine responses on-chain.
Adding third-party animation libraries (implement using existing Tailwind/CSS/React patterns already in the project).
